import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { AuthServiceService } from './auth/auth-service.service'; import { Router } from '@angular/router'; @Component({ selector: 'app-root', templateUrl: './app.component.html', styleUrls: ['./app.component.css'] }) export class AppComponent { title = 'Government Board'; constructor(public auth: AuthServiceService, private router: Router){router.canceledNavigationResolution = 'computed';} logout() { this.auth.removeToken() this.router.navigate(['/']) alert("Logged Out") } }
